meanings.definition: A procession of vehicles, typically cars, traveling together for a special event or purpose.
meanings.sent1: The motorcade of cars drove slowly through the city, celebrating the team's victory.
meanings.sent2: The president's motorcade made its way through the cheering crowd.
meanings.sent3: The motorcade of vehicles seemed to be in a race against time, reaching the finish line together.
meanings.sent4: The long line of cars in the motorcade resembled a colorful snake winding through the streets.
meanings.sent5: The grand motorcade painted a vibrant picture against the backdrop of the city skyline.

meanings.sent1: They decided to motorcade together for safety during the parade.
meanings.sent2: The team will motorcade to the stadium before the big game.
meanings.sent3: I will motorcade with my friends to the concert, so we don't get separated in traffic.
meanings.sent4: The cars motorcading behind the lead vehicle created a sense of unity.
meanings.sent5: She will motorcade with her colleagues to the conference to show support for their cause.
